Text: The Pioneer and Military Memorial Park is the official name given to seven historic cemeteries in Phoenix, Arizona.
Triplets:<The Pioneer and Military Memorial Park
1:
--------------------
Text: Pioneer and Military Memorial Park:  The cemeteries were founded in 1884 in what was known as "Block 32".
Triplets:<Pioneer and Military Memorial Park
3:
--------------------
Text: Pioneer and Military Memorial Park:  The Pioneer and Military Memorial Park is listed in the National Register of Historic Places.
Triplets:<Pioneer and Military Memorial Park
4:
--------------------
Text: Pioneer and Military Memorial Park:  The historic Smurthwaite House, which is also listed in the National Register of Historic Places, is located on the grounds of the Pioneer and Military Memorial Park and is used as the cemetery's main office.
Triplets:<Pioneer and Military Memorial Park
